item.description:
Grand Opening Art Gallery & Salon 263
Tuesday, Oct. 19th. 7pm.
The House of Beauty
Salon 263 Main st.
Nashua, NH. 03060
603-594-9190 www.salon263.com

Host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Steve O. wrote:
Join me and friends for a complimentary glass of wine and possible win a door prize. Plus, meet some new people, and meet around 20+ local artists and see some of their work. This is the Grand opening of the salon and gallery. Anything, you do buy there. A percent of the proceeds will be donated to the NH. Breast Cancer Coalition. The Opening starts at 4-30pm. and ends at 8:30pm. I plan to be there from 7 to 8;30.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Boutiuqe & Art Gallery Opening
